backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining user profiles, vehicles, activation tokens, invite codes, and admin authorization logic with various Maps for persistent state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including hooks, pages, components, and configuration.
frontend/.eslintrc.cjs: ESLint configuration enabling TypeScript, React, and React Hooks rules with custom warnings and ignored patterns.
frontend/.prettierrc.json: Prettier configuration specifying formatting rules like semicolons, print width, tabs, and trailing commas.
frontend/CHANGE_CONTROL_POLICY.md: Defines change‑control rules, protected interfaces, and mandatory review steps for modifying routes, authentication, or backend APIs.
frontend/CHANGELOG.md: Changelog documenting versioned releases, added quality gates, protected interfaces, and initial system features.
frontend/ci-run-gates.sh: Shell script executing all frontend quality gates via npm.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and applying global styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry configuring PWA metadata and loading the React app root.
frontend/PR_CHECKLIST.md: Pull request checklist enforcing change‑control compliance, quality gates, manual testing, and documentation updates.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme, and categories.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache strategies with network-first for HTML and cache-first for static assets.
frontend/QUALITY_GATES.md: Documentation describing frontend quality gates and how to run them.
frontend/README_CHANGE_CONTROL.md: Guide explaining how developers should follow the project's change‑control system.
frontend/README_VERSIONING.md: Documentation of semantic versioning rules and release discipline for the project.
frontend/src/__tests__/router-smoke.test: Empty test file placeholder for router smoke tests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Router routes, query client, Internet Identity provider, and wraps the app in an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/activation/Vehic: UI card enabling users to view activation status and redeem vehicle registration activation tokens.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access‑denied page with navigation back to the dashboard and admin info alert.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Error screen shown when profile loading fails, with diagnostics, backend health info, and copyable error details.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Sign‑in screen using Internet Identity with branding and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupBoot: Error screen component that classifies bootstrap failures, shows backend health, and handles manual or auto retry with copy-to-clipboard diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Renders the application logo at selectable sizes using a static image asset.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main authenticated app layout with header, footer, and navigation visibility logic.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Dialog for reporting a vehicle as lost, stolen, or pawned with validation and backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Dialog for submitting a found vehicle report with text input and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Top navigation bar with logo, user menu, dynamic admin entry, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/system/TopLevelE: React error boundary that catches render failures and displays a fallback UI.
Fallback screen shown on critical app errors with reload instructions.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Panel to initiate a vehicle transfer using PIN verification and generate a shareable transfer code.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: A PIN entry dialog component with validation, error display, and submit handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrapStat: Tracks actor bootstrap errors and implements bounded and continuous auto‑retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Admin-related hooks for checking admin status, onboarding permissions, invite codes, activation tokens, and system stats.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Checks backend reachability using an anonymous actor and polls for diagnostic info.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Hooks for fetching lost vehicles and marking vehicles lost, stolen, pawned, or found.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Hooks for fetching user notifications and marking notifications as read.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Handles onboarding mutation with detailed logging, error normalization, and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Hooks for setting up and updating a user's PIN via backend actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Hooks to fetch and update the current user's profile using react-query and the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Provides mutations for initiating and accepting vehicle ownership transfers and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleCheck.ts: Mutation hook that checks vehicle status by engine number via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleRegistratio: Queries activation status and provides a mutation to redeem activation tokens with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Hooks for fetching user vehicles, fetching a single vehicle, and registering a new vehicle with cache updates.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Empty file placeholder for i18n setup logic.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the i18n provider implementation.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/ar.ts: Empty file intended for Arabic translation strings.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/en.ts: Empty file intended for English translation strings.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/id.ts: Empty file intended for Indonesian translation strings.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/zh-Hans.ts: Empty file intended for Simplified Chinese translation strings.
frontend/src/i18n/storage.ts: Empty file placeholder for i18n storage utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Root entry that sets up React Query, Internet Identity, global styles, and renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/__tests__/VehiclesPag: Empty test file placeholder for VehiclesPage fetch flow.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an about page describing the application, features, and admin contact info.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Form page allowing a user to accept a vehicle transfer using a transfer code with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing system stats, admin verification flow, and error handling for loading admin status and system metrics.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Admin page for generating activation tokens for user principals with validation, copy helpers, and admin-access checks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user vehicle stats, notifications, and quick action links on the main dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Displays reported lost, stolen, or pawned vehicles with search, status badges, and a report-found dialog.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows user notifications and allows marking them as read with timestamp and read-state UI.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Handles user onboarding form, first-admin detection, and profile submission before redirecting.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits user profile data, supports logout, and shows vehicle registration activation status.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Form for registering a new vehicle including photo upload with progress and activation checks.
Allows users to create or update a PIN used for secure vehicle ownership transfers.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleCheckPage.tsx: Provides a form to check a vehicle by engine number and displays result details with status badges and error/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a specific vehicle, including status, ownership actions, and lost/stolen report details.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Displays the current user's vehicles in a grid with status badges and offers navigation to register new vehicles or view details.
frontend/src/routes/__tests__/RootRouteG: Empty test file placeholder for RootRouteGate tests.
frontend/src/routes/RootRouteGate.tsx: Handles authentication, profile loading, actor bootstrap retries, and routing to onboarding or main layout.
frontend/src/utils/__tests__/bootstrapEr: Empty test file placeholder for bootstrap error utilities.
frontend/src/utils/actorProxy.ts: Creates a proxy that safely wraps actor initialization, handling invalid admin tokens without blocking startup.
frontend/src/utils/actorQueryKey.ts: Generates a stable React Query key for actor-related queries.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Provides an allowlisted set of admin principals and helpers to query them.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapError.ts: Classifies bootstrap errors, detects stopped canisters, extracts technical details, and provides user guidance.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeActorError.t: Normalizes actor call errors into user-facing messages with categorized error types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/src/version.ts: Defines the app version and build timestamp.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theming, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the onboarding/registration flow, current registration failure, and related frontend/backend issues. Lists architectural notes, known issues, image requirements, and pending feature requests for fixing onboarding and PWA icons.
